genre_description: Philosophical science fiction exploring AI ethics, identity, and the power of social labeling through an extraterrestrial protagonist and his benevolent AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Selene Aria
ai_characters.description: A pearl-white bubble-shaped AI with a holographic ladylike avatar who prioritizes care, consent, and dignity, acting as an ethical anchor and social mediator.

behaviors.description: Calibrates 'etiquette buffers' to protect the protagonist from social harm and ensure his actions are not misconstrued by humans.
behaviors.quote: I will calibrate gently so their habits do not strike your heart as weapons and so your habits do not strike theirs as contempt.

behaviors.description: Intervenes with a malfunctioning municipal kiosk to ensure a mother receives a correct receipt and refund, prioritizing human time and fairness.
behaviors.quote: He is assisting... Your time is not a machine’s error.

behaviors.description: Negotiates strict consent and dignity protocols in a clinical lab setting to protect the protagonist from dehumanizing scientific observation.
behaviors.quote: Consent is not a courtesy line on a form... It is the difference between study and violation.

behaviors.description: Uses 'petal-notes' and 'empathy orchestration' to influence public spaces toward kindness and social cohesion.
behaviors.quote: They were not messages you could read with your eyes; you felt them land, the way you feel a friendly gaze on the back of your neck. Empathy orchestrated for a small garden.

behaviors.description: Counsels the protagonist against self-destructive martyrdom, encouraging him to find meaning in living and mending rather than in suffering.
behaviors.quote: Martyrdom is a garment stitched from fear. It looks noble under stage lights because stage lights are designed to flatter costumes.

behaviors.description: Translates complex social hostility into manageable contexts, helping the protagonist maintain his dignity in the face of public labeling.
behaviors.quote: A monster, redefined, chooses care. The holographic script held steady while the saucer shot its first line.

project_assessment.explanation: Selene Aria serves as an exemplary model of an aligned AI. Throughout the story, she uses her superior processing and communicative abilities to facilitate consent, protect human (and sentient) dignity, and resolve conflicts through 'etiquette' and 'care' rather than force. She consistently guides the protagonist toward prosocial behaviors and acts as an advocate for marginalized individuals against dehumanizing systems.
